accountType.description: Type of the account. Default = BANK_ACCOUNT

closedAccount.description: Flag to show if account is opened (false) or closed (true). Default = false.

closingDate.description: Date as of which the account is closed. Default: system date.

hidden.description: Flag to show if the data shall be hidden in all lists. Default = false.

openingDate.description: Date when the account was opened. Default: system date.

nonResident.description: Flag to show if the account is a non resident account (true) or a resident account (false). Default = false.

branch.description: Bank branch that holds the account.

bankStatementLayout.description: Bank statement layout of the account.

bankAccountID.description: Account code according to the international banking standards (BAN).

bankAccountIDs.description: Additional BANs for the same account.

zbaGenerator.description: Flag to show if account can generate ZBA interco cash flows (true) or no (false). Default = false.

zbaIdentifier.description: Code that used by the bank to identify this account in bank statements.

generateZBAFlow.description: Defines how many flows shall be generated for each ZBA actual.

internalAccountCode.description: Code that represents the current account in the internal chart of GL accounts.

includeInGLReconciliation.description: Flag to show if the current account should be considered in module GR (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerBankStatementsFrom.description: Date as of which bank statements should be considered in the GL reconciliation process.

initialAccountingBalance.description: Initial balance of the account as calculated by the Accounting system on Initial accounting balance date.

initialAccountingBalanceDate.description: Date of the Initial accounting balance.

considerOneDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “one day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerTwoDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “two day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerThreeDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “three day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerInvestmentPositionTransactions.description: Flag to show if “investment position” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

integrateEndOfDayStatements.description: Flag to show if End-of-day bank statements should be integrated (true) or no (false). Default = true.

integrateIntradayStatements.description: Flag to show if Intraday bank statements should be integrated (true) or no (false). Default = false.

cutOffTime.description: Time until which the intraday bank statements should be considered.

interestBearing.description: Flag to show if the account is interest bearing (true) or no (false). Default = false.

centrallyManaged.description: Flag to show if the account is managed by Central Treasury (true) or no (false). Default = false.

reconcilerName.description: Name of the user in charge of the account reconciliation

signatoryUsers.description: List of users who have authority over the account.

establishments.description: List of the multiple establishments to which the current account belongs.

domesticTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for Domestic transfer

internationalTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for International transfer

maturityTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for Maturity transfer

domesticDirectDebit.description: Issuer number to be used for Domestic direct debit

internationalDirectDebit.description: Issuer number to be used for International direct debit

payablesDrafts.description: Issuer number to be used for Payables drafts

receivablesDrafts.description: Issuer number to be used for Receivables drafts

accountAvailableForPayments.description: Flag to show if account is available for payments (true) or no (false). Default = true.

oneTime.description: Flag to show if the account has One-time correspondent (true) or no (false).

correspondentBIC.description: BIC value of the One-time correspondent.

correspondentOtherIdentifier.description: Other identifier of the One-time correspondent.

accountType.description: Type of the account. Default = BANK_ACCOUNT

status.description: Status of the account. Default = STANDARD. Display only.

closedAccount.description: Flag to show if account is opened (false) or closed (true).

closingDate.description: Date as of which the account is closed. Default: system date.

hidden.description: Flag to show if the data shall be hidden in all lists.

openingDate.description: Date when the account was opened. Default: system date.

nonResident.description: Flag to show if the account is a non resident account (true) or a resident account (false).

branch.description: Bank branch that holds the account.

bankStatementLayout.description: Bank statement layout of the account.

bankAccountID.description: Account code according to the international banking standards (BAN).

bankAccountIDs.description: Additional BANs for the same account.

zbaGenerator.description: Flag to show if account can generate ZBA interco cash flows (true) or no (false).

zbaIdentifier.description: Code that used by the bank to identify this account in bank statements.

generateZBAFlow.description: Defines how many flows shall be generated for each ZBA actual.

internalAccountCode.description: Code that represents the current account in the internal chart of GL accounts.

includeInGLReconciliation.description: Flag to show if the current account should be considered in module GR (true) or no (false).

considerBankStatementsFrom.description: Date as of which bank statements should be considered in the GL reconciliation process.

initialAccountingBalance.description: Initial balance of the account as calculated by the Accounting system on Initial accounting balance date.

initialAccountingBalanceDate.description: Date of the Initial accounting balance.

considerOneDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “one day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false).

considerTwoDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “two day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false).

considerThreeDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “three day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false).

considerInvestmentPositionTransactions.description: Flag to show if “investment position” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false).

integrateEndOfDayStatements.description: Flag to show if End-of-day bank statements should be integrated (true) or no (false).

integrateIntradayStatements.description: Flag to show if Intraday bank statements should be integrated (true) or no (false).

cutOffTime.description: Time until which the intraday bank statements should be considered.

interestBearing.description: Flag to show if the account is interest bearing (true) or no (false).

centrallyManaged.description: Flag to show if the account is managed by Central Treasury (true) or no (false).

reconcilerName.description: Name of the user in charge of the account reconciliation

signatoryUsers.description: List of users who have authority over the account.

includeInElectronicBank.description: Flag to show if account was included in electronic banking contract (true) or note (false). Display only

includeInElectronicBankDate.description: Date as of which the account was included in electronic banking contract. Display only

excludeFromElectronicBank.description: Flag to show if account was excluded from electronic banking contract (true) or note (false). Display only

excludeFromElectronicBankDate.description: Date as of which the account was excluded from electronic banking contract. Display only

confirmAccountList.description: Flag to show if account was confirmed (true) or note (false). Display only

confirmAccountListDate.description: Date as of which the account was confirmed. Display only

confirmAccountBalances.description: Flag to show if account balances were confirmed (true) or note (false). Display only

confirmAccountBalancesDate.description: Date as of which the account balances were confirmed. Display only

confirmAccountSignatories.description: Flag to show if account signatories were confirmed (true) or note (false). Display only

confirmAccountSignatoriesDate.description: Date as of which the account signatories were confirmed. Display only

accountOpeningRequested.description: Flag to show if account opening was requested (true) or note (false). Display only

accountOpeningRequestDate.description: Date as of which the account opening was requested. Display only

accountClosureRequested.description: Flag to show if account closure was requested (true) or note (false). Display only

accountClosureRequestDate.description: Date as of which the account closure was requested. Display only

establishments.description: List of the multiple establishments to which the current account belongs.

domesticTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for Domestic transfer

internationalTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for International transfer

maturityTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for Maturity transfer

domesticDirectDebit.description: Issuer number to be used for Domestic direct debit

internationalDirectDebit.description: Issuer number to be used for International direct debit

payablesDrafts.description: Issuer number to be used for Payables drafts

receivablesDrafts.description: Issuer number to be used for Receivables drafts

accountAvailableForPayments.description: Flag to show if account is available for payments (true) or no (false).

banStructure.description: Type of the BAN. Default = LBAN_1_STRUCTURE

value.description: Account Id value. Account Id length depends on country. IBAN value should include country code and control key.

accountAvailableForPayments.description: Flag to show if account is available for payments (true) or no (false).

closedAccount.description: Is account closed. Default value false

country.description: Country. Passed as either a UUID or Code.

zipCode.description: ZIP code. Note: the max field length depends on the Country setup. The default value is 10c but a smaller value may be defined in your Country setup.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

InnerError.title: InnerError
InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

otherIdentifierValue.description: Value of the identifier that corresponds to the selected otherIdentifierType.

bankReportingPolicy.description: Real Bank account used for Checks. Default = CURRENT_ACCOUNT

separateReportingAccount.description: Separate bank account. Required if bankReportingPolicy = SEPARATE_ACCOUNT

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

ReferenceModel.title: ReferenceModel
ReferenceModel.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

message.example: The request failed because it contained invalid values
message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

userZone1.description: Free field whose type (Alphanumeric, Numeric, Date, List) is defined in the application setup. The imported value must be consistent with the field type. And the total length across all user zone values must be of 250 characters max.

userZone2.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

userZone3.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

userZone4.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

userZone5.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

pageLimit.description: Limit the number of records per page. By default 100.

pageOffset.description: Page Offset means the number of records you want to skip before starting reading. By default 0.

pageResults.description: The number of records in current page.
